General_Description: '''When the Weak Fall''' was a virtual representation of one of [[Kassandra]]'s genetic memories, relived by [[Layla Hassan]] through the Portable [[Animus|Animus HR-8.5]].
Section_Description: On a [[message board]], Kassandra found a note about a contract: "An enemy state must be weakened if ground is to be gained." – [[Nation Leader|Leader]] of (region)
Section_Outcome: Kassandra brought the Nation Power down in the region, gaining rewards for doing this.
Section_Behind_the_scenes: This very same contract appears also under the names [[Depleting Forces]], [[Hitting the Weak]], and [[Weakening the Enemy]].
Section_References:
*''[[Assassin's Creed: Odyssey]]''
